Went to start wiring up our Spark MAX’s last night so we could flash them all with new firmware, and seem to have forgotten where we stored these cables back in 2020 for “safe keeping”.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eMy guess is we’re looking for anywhere from 4-8 cables. I’m trying to avoid shipping from the US REV warehouse, as shipping for these tiny cables is more than the cables themselves ($27 via USPS which wont arrive for at least 2-3 weeks, or anywhere from $36-$100 to go with FedEx depending on the shipping priority selected).\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2022-02-23T20:00:09.681Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":6,"reads":62,"readers_count":61,"score":42.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":403742,"topic_slug":"spark-max-can-cables-canada","display_username":"Brian Wagg","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.revrobotics.com/rev-11-1880/","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"SPARK MAX CAN Cable V2 - 2 Pack - REV Robotics","clicks":14}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":19532,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Brian Wagg"},"post_url":"/t/spark-max-can-cables-canada/403742/1","custom_user_title":"Brian Wagg","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3151409,"name":"system","username":"system","avatar_template":"/uploads/default/original/4X/9/3/2/93234578e69f55873c63fc00fe2d0d85f23bce55.png","created_at":"2023-02-23T19:58:19.701Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eThis topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply.
